full_summary:
# Multi-disciplinary A&E Consultant Services Source List - Atlantic Region
## Solicitation Information

* Tender Title: Multi-disciplinary Architecture and Engineering Consultant Services Source List for Atlantic Canada
* Solicitation Number: AR23SL02
* Amendment Number: 3
* Publication Date: August 18, 2023
* Closing Date and Time for Tenders: September 27, 2023 (2:00 PM ET)

## Contract Information

* Contracting Authority: Defence Construction Canada / Construction de Défense Canada
* Contracting Officer: Jacob Lachapelle, jacob.lachapelle@dcc-cdc.gc.ca
* Contract Start Date: Not Specified
* Contract End Date: Not Specified

## Description of the Solicitation

Defence Construction Canada (DCC) is seeking to establish a Source List of consultants for multi-disciplinary Architecture and Engineering (A&E) services for the Atlantic Canada region. The firms selected for the Source List will be invited to submit proposals for as-and-when-required professional services specific to Department of National Defence (DND) requirements.

## Contract Value and Term

The Source List will be valid for two (2) years with a maximum estimated value of CAD $10,000,000.00. Each commission under the Source List is estimated to be between CAD $100,000.00 and CAD $350,000.00.

## Eligibility

Interested firms must submit their Abbreviated Proposals through the MERX Electronic Bidding System by the closing date and time.

## Bidding Documents

Bidding documents and associated information can be found on the MERX website at http://www.merx.com. Fees may apply for access to the MERX system; see https://www.merx.com/public/pricing for more information.

## Additional Information

* Contracting Authority's Website: Defence Construction Canada Website (cdc-dcc.gc.ca)
* Contract Award Results: Contract Activity - Defence Construction Canada (cdc-dcc.gc.ca)
* Security Requirements: Identified in the RFP Document
